src: 很不幸，有人撞到他了。
mt: Unfortunate, someone bumped into him.

src: 她全力以赴，竭尽所能。
mt: She is doing her best.
ref: She played hard and gave it her all.

src: 他们害怕妈妈会生气。
mt: They are afraid their mother will be angry.
ref: They were afraid their mom would get angry at them.

src: 他决定给她写一首歌。
mt: He decided to write her a song.
ref: He decided to write a song to her.

src: 一天，有人向他挑战，要和他进行比赛。

src: 水仍然是冷的。

mt: I am sitting on a bus, traveling through the suburbs of Boston.

mt: Finally he went to see a doctor and found it was caused by poison ivy.
ref: He finally went to the doctor and he found out he had poison ivy.

mt: They always play one-on-one.
ref: They would always play one on one.

src: 姑娘们玩得不亦乐乎。
mt: The girls are having a great time.
ref: The girls had a ton of fun.

src: 在健身房里，她锻炼了手臂和腹部。
mt: In the gym, she worked her arms and abs.
ref: While at the gym she did arms and abs.

src: 不幸的是，她丢了工作，最终也丢了房子。
mt: Unfortunately, she lost her job and eventually her house.
ref: Unfortunately, she lost her job and eventually, her home.

src: 她们一起给苹果去皮，清洗。
mt: They are peeling apples together, washing them.
ref: Together, they peeled and cleaned the apples.

mt: He took all his money and bought a lollipop.
ref: He brought all his chance and bought the sucker.

mt: He arrived there and saw the magnificent castle.
ref: When he got there, he saw gorgeous old castles.

src: 他辛勤工作，攒下所有钱。
mt: He worked hard and saved all the money.
ref: He worked very hard and saved up all his money.

src: 出事了，一根安全绳断了。
mt: It broke a safety rope.
ref: Something went wrong and one of the safety harnesses snapped.

src: 他很少准时出现。
mt: He is rarely on time.
ref: He rarely showed up on time.

src: 她勤奋学习。
mt: She is diligent in her studies.
ref: She studied very hard.

mt: 8+ hours to move all my stuff into the apartment.
ref: It took me over 8 hours to get all of the stuff into my apartment.

mt: One day, Haili's mother and another mother argued.

mt: Until today, he still had peppermints in his medicine cabinet.
ref: To this day he keeps peppermints in his cupboards.

ref: One day, they were all going down a challenging slope.

mt: When she is not in class, she is very serious about her studies.
ref: When she wasn't in class, she studied very hard.

src: 她们在商场里吃了午饭。
mt: They had lunch at the mall.
ref: They had lunch at the mall.

src: 他觉得自己需要一个保护手机的手机壳。
mt: He felt he needed a case to protect his phone.
ref: He decided he needed a case to protect his phone.

src: 服务区有个加油站，一家汉堡王。
mt: 服务区 has a gas station, a Burger King.
ref: At the stop there was a gas station and a Burger King.

src: 电话那头的女人我不熟悉。
mt: I don't know the woman on the phone.
ref: The woman who was on the other line was unfamiliar to me.

src: 她最后一名顾客也生气了。虽然不是她的错。
mt: She was angry with her last customer, too, even though it wasn't her fault.
ref: Even her last customer was mad and it wasn't even her fault.

src: 艾力克买了带字母的积木。
mt: Erik bought some alphabet blocks.
ref: Alec bought blocks with letters on them.

src: 趁他睡着，我杀了他。
mt: I killed him while he was sleeping.
ref: I killed him while he slept.

src: 他问父母有没有。
mt: He asked his parents if they had any.
ref: He asked his parents if they had any.

src: 她做了好喝的果蔬奶昔。
mt: She made a delicious fruit and vegetable smoothie.
ref: She made delicious fruit and vegetable smoothies.

src: 他说她的技巧不好，不能入队。
mt: He said her skills were not good enough to join the team.
ref: He said that her skills aren't good enough to make the team.

src: 她发现自己把钱包落家里了。
mt: She found that she had left her wallet at home.
ref: She realized she had forgotten her wallet at home.

mt: The boss told her the money would be on the next check.
ref: Her boss informed her it would be on her next check.

src: 她有进步，但是进步不快。
mt: She's improving, but not quickly.
ref: She made progress, but not quickly.

ref: His friends threw a party on the beach after the sun went down.

src: 他没受伤，但衣服破了。
mt: He was not injured, but his clothes were torn.
ref: He wasn't hurt but his outfit was ruined.

ref: One day, a stranger tells him that he should smile more.

mt: He hit a jogger crossing the street.

mt: To show off his personality, he wore a short skirt on stage.

src: 我兢兢业业地工作，赢得了这次晋升。
mt: I worked diligently and earned this promotion.

mt: She made glycerin soap in a big pot on her stove.
ref: She made glycerin soap in a big pot on her kitchen stove.

mt: They were given a hint to search behind the library.

mt: She had imagined that she could make a delicious meal.

mt: In one job interview, the interviewer complimented his name.

mt: However, she lost it while shopping today.

mt: I decided to buy him a ticket to see Star Wars.

src: 所幸她没事。
mt: She is fine.

mt: They both applied to Cornell University and plan to be roommates.

src: 我读了一些评论，随后去了商店。
mt: I read some comments and then went to the store.
ref: I went to the store after reading some reviews.

src: 他想到了自己收藏的邮票。
mt: He thought of the stamps he collected.

mt: They were both deployed to the same unit.

src: 他指示我该坐在哪里。
mt: He told me where to sit.

src: 他一直打个不停。
mt: He kept on playing.

src: 它有来自世界各地的各种食物。
mt: It has food from all over the world.
ref: It had all kinds of food from all over the world.

src: 他爬得太高了，摔下来了。
mt: He climbed too high and fell down.
ref: He got up too high and fell.

src: 然后点了中餐外卖。
mt: Then ordered Chinese takeout.
ref: Then she ordered Chinese takeout.

src: 在她咬了一口自己做的食物之前，这顿饭都很顺利。

src: 我们一起烤了饼干，装饰了房子，去了购物。
mt: We baked cookies together, decorated the house, and went shopping.
ref: We baked cookies, decorated the house and went shopping together.

src: 当垃圾被送到垃圾填埋场的时候，松鼠不见了！
mt: When the garbage is sent to the landfill, the squirrels are gone!
ref: When the trash was taken to the landfill, the squirrel was gone!

src: 汤姆很激动将这份礼物送给罗伯。
mt: Tom was excited to give this gift to Rob.
ref: Tom was excited to give the gift to Rob.

src: 她以前所未有的力度奋力游，以便追上其他选手。
mt: She swam with unprecedented force to catch up with other competitors.
ref: She pushed harder than she ever had to catch the other swimmers.

src: 随后他发现了一些奇怪的事。
mt: He then discovered some strange things.
ref: Then he noticed something odd.

src: 他为此烦恼了好几天。
mt: He worried about it for several days.
ref: He fretted over it for days.

src: 最后他又一次被拦下了。
mt: He was stopped again.

src: 他听到鸟儿鸣叫、风声萧萧、蟋蟀吱吱作响。
mt: He hears the birds chirping, the wind whistling, and the crickets chirping.
ref: He heard the birds sing, the wind blow and the crickets creak.

src: 泰德开始写作关于不同游戏的评论和文章。
mt: Ted began writing reviews and articles about different games.

mt: After that, Tami went to the gym to take her favorite aerobics class.
ref: Tammy then headed for the gym to her favorite aerobics class.

src: 她每次在附近散步大约 30 分钟。
mt: 30 minutes each time she walks around the neighborhood.
ref: She walks for about 30 minutes at a time around the neighborhood.

src: 他听到一个声音告诉他前往哪一层。
mt: He heard a voice telling him to go to which floor.
ref: He heard a voice telling him what floor to go to.
